name: Fruit Pick Tricks
description:
A first person puzzle platformer about picking and throwing fruit. Made for Ludum Dare 52 with theme "Harvest". Made in Unity building on the First Person Template.

Note that R restarts from the previous checkpoint - this will very likely be necessary.

Controls:


KeyboardController
Restart From Checkpoint
RNorth ButtonMoveWASD / Arrow Keys
Left StickPick Up Fruit
Right Click / EWest button
Throw Fruit
Left Click
Right Trigger
SprintShiftLeft TriggerJumpSpaceSouth ButtonSwitch Active Fruit
Number keys / mouse wheelShoulder ButtonsMute MusicM

Game by Toombler.

Sound and Music by @wrightwrighter.

NOTE: At release there was a mistake which was sending you out of bounds at a certain part, that should be fixed now though
